Package edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.animation

Classes pertaining to animating the motion of game objects.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Animation
    Interface representing an abstract animation, which defines the Orientation of an object over time.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Keyframe
    Information holder class for a single keyframe.
    KeyframeAnimation
    Represents a animation created by a sequence of "frames", where each frame consists of a position, rotation, and scaling of the object this animation can be applied to.
    KeyframeAnimationBuilder
    Builder class used to construct KeyframeAnimations.
    KeyframeInterpolation
    Interpolation class used internally be KeyframeAnimation.

Package edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.animation Description

Classes pertaining to animating the motion of game objects.

The most common use-case of this package is to create a new KeyframeAnimation object like so: 

 Animation animation = KeyframeAnimation.create() // create animation builder
         // code to create keyframes
         .setPosition(...)
         .addKeyframe(duration1)
         .setPosition(...)
         .setRotation(...)
         .addKeyframe(duration2)
         .rotateBy(...)
         .addKeyframe() // last keyframe has no duration
         // ... et cetera
         .build(); // build the animation
